name: EVERLY HEALTH
description: A digital health company providing at-home COVID-19 testing and other wellness tests
sampleDescriptions: Introduce Everlywells testing solutions to policymakers; reimbursement and telehealth issues associated with COVID-19 tests.

Introduce policymakers to company to educate about testing capabilities; educate policymakers about company's testing solutions; educate policymakers about COVID-19 testing reimbursement and telehealt
Introduce company's capabilities to facilitate and vaccinations to policymakers, and discuss a proposal to maintain rapid testing and lab capacity.
